title: 02/16/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/16/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Mike Florio about whether he thinks Aaron Donald is seriously considering retiring. HOF Broadcaster Jim Gray discusses how his friendship with Tom Brady developed to the point that they do a podcast together. And Gold Medalist Snowboarder Shaun White calls in and shares the emotions that came with deciding to retire.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Mike Florio about whether he thinks Aaron Donald is seriously considering retiring. HOF Broadcaster Jim Gray discusses how his friendship with Tom Brady developed to the point that they do a podcast together. And Gold Medalist Snowboarder Shaun White calls in and shares the emotions that came with deciding to retire.
